title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message.
OB: The message displayed in the New Package Wizard is confusing.
EB: The message in the New Package Wizard should provide clear instructions or information.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new Java Project. 2. Select the project. 3. Proceed to open the New Package Wizard.
